title: Lord of Glory - Novel Updates
tags: Accelerated Growth   Alchemy   Clever Protagonist   Cold Protagonist   Depictions of Cruelty   Dragons   Elves   Evil Organizations   Evil Protagonist   Evolution   Fast Cultivation   God Protagonist   Gore   Magic   Male Protagonist   Schemes And Conspiracies   Selfish Protagonist   Wars   Weak to Strong
author: Mei Changsheng   寐长生
description: “By injecting light into the darkness, I had incredible power. By sucking the essence of life, I became an immortal monster. Dressed in a sacred cloak, singing the mass of the devil. Yes. “Even if that’s his end! I will always die!” It’s a biography of a man who has evolved from body to soul into a God!>
